entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0002 suggests simplifying generated classes to their base class #75162
  • Stack overflow in ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe #75157
  • Editing Roslyn.sln in VSCode crashes with frequent stack overflows #75155

Closed

  • Collection expressions: invalid code generated for inline array spread element #70708
    17.12
  • Source generators: Decimal argument in attribute parameter results in TypedConstant with null value #75158
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35317.64 #75154

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75156
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Updating to match Gladstone and Editor side changes #75153
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Check for source only properties before tool restore #75161
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Properly iterate through an inline array used as a spread element. #75151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next

Updated

  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix null dereference in GetAssemblyReferenceAlias #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Try latest NuGet #75148
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler to test Gladstone integration #75146
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix the SmartRename button regressions #75134
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Test EnC document diagnostics in non-host workspace #75140
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
